document_data.name: Dark door
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Dark Door''' was a very well-furnished, albeit particularly expensive, inn located in the [[dwarven]] village of [[Glen]] within [[Mistledale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was noteworthy in for being made entirely of stone and, of course, being extremely welcoming to [[dwarves]].

The cryptic name of the inn referenced the "deep mine", an entrance to the [[Underdark]] also found within the village. This entrance was shrouded in secrecy and unknown to the larger community of Mistrans throughout the dale,
